title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Tom Verducci of Sports Illustrated about MLB expansion and automated strike zones. FS1's Nick Wright calls in to discuss his back-and-forth with Draymond Green. Plus, ESPN's Mike Wilbon explains why he isn't on board with what the Knicks are going to offer Jalen Brunson.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
